results.t: Chromium - Uses, Side Effects, and More
results.p: Chromium is an essential trace mineral. There are two forms: trivalent chromium, which is safe for humans, and hexavalent chromium, which is a toxin.

results.t: Chromium - Element information, properties and uses
results.p: Chromium is used to harden steel, to manufacture stainless steel (named as it won't rust) and to produce several alloys.

Sep 3, 2023 — Some studies have shown that chromium supplements may help people with type 2 diabetes and insulin resistance.
